item.title: The Only AngularJS Modal Service You'll Ever Need
item.description: If you need modals in an AngularJS application, look no further. I'll show you how to use the Angular Modal Service to add Bootstrap Modals or your own custom modals to your application. See it in a fiddle or check out a full set of samples online. Contents [Using the Angular Modal Service](#UsingTheAngular ModalService) A Quick Example Design Goals How It Works Wrapping Up Using the Angular Modal Service Here's how you can use the Angular Modal Service to add a bootstrap modal to your application.

item.title: XPath Studio - First Cut
item.description: I have just uploaded the first cut of my mini-project ‘XPath Studio’. This project is a small site that lets you choose a URL to a source webpage, and run any XPath query against it - showing the data that is returned from the query.
